sample

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • sample.Controller

  • public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
    This method is what makes the gui run properly. All the different interactions within the gui are controlled through this file.

    • Method Detail

      • handleAddButtonAction

        public void handleAddButtonAction()
                           throws java.sql.SQLException
        This method allows the user to insert an item into the database. This also makes the item show up in the table view below the button.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - - uses sql to insert data into the database.

      • handleAddRecordAction

        public void handleAddRecordAction()
        This method allows the quantity to be updated in the database.

      • initialize

        public void initialize()
        This method allows the database to receive items. This also populates the combo boxes and the choice boxes to allow users to choose an amount and type.
